name: PoolAddressesProviderRegistry
description: PoolAddressesProviderRegistry. Used for indexing purposes of Aave protocol's markets. The id assigned to a PoolAddressesProvider refers to the market it is connected with, for example with `1` for the Aave main market and `2` for the next created.*. Main registry of PoolAddressesProvider of Aave markets.

eventDecorators.name: AddressesProviderRegistered
eventDecorators.description: when the auction of a token gets started.

eventDecorators.name: AddressesProviderUnregistered
eventDecorators.description: when the auction of a token gets started.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: when the auction of a token gets started.

functionDecorators.name: getAddressesProviderAddressById
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of a registered PoolAddressesProvider.

returnDecorators.description: The address of the PoolAddressesProvider with the given id or zero address if it is not registered.

functionDecorators.name: getAddressesProviderIdByAddress
functionDecorators.description: Returns the id of a registered PoolAddressesProvider.

returnDecorators.description: The id of the PoolAddressesProvider or 0 if is not registered.

functionDecorators.name: getAddressesProvidersList
functionDecorators.description: Returns the list of registered addresses providers.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: registerAddressesProvider
functionDecorators.description: Registers an addresses provider. The PoolAddressesProvider must not already be registered in the registryThe id must not be used by an already registered PoolAddressesProvider.

parameterDecorators.name: provider
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new PoolAddressesProvider.

parameterDecorators.name: id
parameterDecorators.description: The id for the new PoolAddressesProvider, referring to the market it belongs to*.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: unregisterAddressesProvider
functionDecorators.description: Removes an addresses provider from the list of registered addresses providers.
